name: part_002
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performs a cover of 'Deal with the devil' in a stylized casino-themed stage with silhouette dancers.
Aki Rosenthal addresses the audience in an MC segment, introducing herself and reacting to the stage effects.

subtitles.original: 頂いてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll take it from you.

subtitles.original: 秘密って甘い毒
subtitles.english: Secrets are a sweet poison.

subtitles.original: 仕掛けて 罠にハメるわ
subtitles.english: I'll set it up and trap you.

subtitles.original: 奪い誘うような指
subtitles.english: Fingers that beckon and snatch away...

subtitles.original: 舌を這わせたら最後
subtitles.english: Once I let my tongue crawl, it's the end.

subtitles.original: 何も知らないような顔で
subtitles.english: With a face like you know nothing...

subtitles.original: 躍らすわ あなたを
subtitles.english: I'll make you dance.

subtitles.original: It's Deal with the Devil
subtitles.english: It's Deal with the Devil

subtitles.original: 読み切ってレッツショウダウン
subtitles.english: Read it all, and let's showdown.

subtitles.original: 目を疑う変幻自在の
subtitles.english: Ever-changing, making you doubt your eyes.

subtitles.original: どんな小さなぜるだって
subtitles.english: No matter how small the cheat is...

subtitles.original: 私の目をごまかせないわ
subtitles.english: You can't fool my eyes.

subtitles.original: I am the gambler, aite wa... gomen maade
subtitles.english: I am the gambler, forgive me regardless of who it is.

subtitles.original: 屈服させてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll make you yield.

subtitles.original: 狙った獲物は逃さない
subtitles.english: I won't let my prey escape.

subtitles.original: 唇を濡らして いただきます
subtitles.english: Wetting my lips... Bon appétit.

subtitles.original: Oh, my babe!
subtitles.english: Oh, my babe!

subtitles.original: ダイヤのジャックで手が揃わ
subtitles.english: With the Jack of Diamonds, the hand is complete.

subtitles.original: 笑みはこれ始末だわ
subtitles.english: This smile is the end of the line.

subtitles.original: 鮮やかなポーカーフェイス
subtitles.english: A brilliant poker face.

subtitles.original: 一分の隙も見せやしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't show a single opening.

subtitles.original: 人生感じてんの
subtitles.english: I'm feeling life.

subtitles.original: お遊びは終わりまで
subtitles.english: The play is until the very end.

subtitles.original: 見てばかりいないで
subtitles.english: Don't just watch.

subtitles.original: 私が欲しいから
subtitles.english: Because I want you.

subtitles.original: 負けるのは怖い？
subtitles.english: Are you afraid of losing?

subtitles.original: 読み切ってレッツショウダウン
subtitles.english: Read it all, and let's showdown.

subtitles.original: 目を疑う変幻自在に
subtitles.english: To an ever-changing state that defies the eyes.

subtitles.original: あなたの髪の一本まで全部
subtitles.english: Every single strand of your hair...

subtitles.original: I am the gambler, aite wa... furuete iru no yo
subtitles.english: I am the gambler, the opponent is trembling.

subtitles.original: どこまでも行くわ
subtitles.english: I'll go as far as I can.

subtitles.original: 目を疑う変幻自在の
subtitles.english: Ever-changing, making you doubt your eyes.

subtitles.original: 誰にも触らせない このままで
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone touch it like this.

subtitles.original: I am the gambler, sa come on kakugo kime te
subtitles.english: I am the gambler, so come on, make up your mind.

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで撃って
subtitles.english: Shoot until it turns to ash.

subtitles.original: 惜しがる気持ちはまだ、baby?
subtitles.english: Still feeling reluctant, baby?

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない感じさせて
subtitles.english: Make me feel like I won't lose to anyone.

subtitles.original: ロミオ
subtitles.english: Romeo.

subtitles.original: おっと。あれ？椅子なくなっちゃった。
subtitles.english: Oops. Huh? The chair is gone.

subtitles.original: はぁー。もう少し座らせてほしかったー。
subtitles.english: Phew. I wanted to sit a little longer.

subtitles.original: はい、みんな！見えてる？聞こえてる？
subtitles.english: Hey, everyone! Can you see me? Can you hear me?

subtitles.original:
ホロライブ所属の癒し系ハーフエルフ、
アキロゼこと、アキ・ローゼンタールです！
subtitles.english:
I'm the healing half-elf of Hololive,
Aki Rosenthal, also known as Akirose!

subtitles.original: アロハ、アロハ、アロハ、アロナ〜！
subtitles.english: Aloha, aloha, aloha, Alona~!

subtitles.original: はぁー、えー、今回のアキロゼ生誕祭2026へようこそ！
subtitles.english: Phew... welcome to Akirose Birthday Festival 2026!

subtitles.original: 早速ね、なんか色々行われていたんですが、一体今回のライブはどうなっちゃうのか、ぜひ最後まで必見、お見逃しなくお願いします！
subtitles.english: A lot of things have been happening right from the start, but please stay tuned until the very end to see how this live show unfolds!

subtitles.original: 今回のライブのハッシュタグは、「#アキロゼ生誕祭2026」、こちらをつけてXにたくさんポストしてね！
subtitles.english: The hashtag for today's live is '#AkirozeSeitansai2026', so please use it and post a lot on X!

subtitles.original: もちろん、可愛いスクショ、えー、もたくさん撮って、合わせて投稿してください！
subtitles.english: Of course, take lots of cute screenshots and post them too!

subtitles.original: ライブが終わった後、アキロゼ見に行きまーす！見てねー！
subtitles.english: Akirose will go check them out after the live! Stay tuned!

subtitles.original: あ、チャンネル登録もよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Oh, and please subscribe to the channel!

subtitles.original: オッケー？たくさん撮って？はい、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Okay? Did you take lots? Yes, thank you!

subtitles.original: お？お？なんだ？なに、なに、なに？うーん？
subtitles.english: Oh? Oh? What's this? What, what, what? Hmm?

subtitles.original: ていうか、ここどこなんだろう？うーん、あ？
subtitles.english: By the way, where am I? Hmm, oh?

subtitles.original: おおー、あんなとこにルーレットがある。え、回るのかな？
subtitles.english: Whoa, there's a roulette wheel over there. Huh, I wonder if it spins?

subtitles.original: お！え！回った！えー、すごーい！回ったー、えー！見事！
subtitles.english: Oh! Whoa! It spun! Whoa, amazing! It spun! Wow! Splendid!
